Articles.Content: Is there any mod where walls contain transparent windows? I was trying to build a habitat for a Kerbonaut to walk around in. There are some places in that habitat I want to have windows so the Kerbals could enjoy the view.

In JSI there is a transparent pod setting the new AmericanPack and ERS mod and there is a mod called Transparent pod which all use JSI

MODULE

{

name = JSITransparentPod

}
If you mean you want hollowed parts with transparent walls where your kerbals can walk inside while "on EVA", then I think you need Lack Luster Labs.
Glass Box Enclosure and Glass panels mod
